title: Understanding the Watch Window
text: The Watch Window in Excel is a tool that allows you to monitor the values of certain cells while you work on a spreadsheet. It is particularly useful for keeping track of important data without having to scroll through the entire sheet.

title: Locating the Watch Window
text: To access the Watch Window, go to the 'Formulas' tab on the ribbon, then click on 'Watch Window' in the 'Formula Auditing' group.

hintAnswer: select the cell you want to stop watching, then click "Delete Watch" in Watch Window
title: Deleting a Watch
text: To delete a cell from the Watch Window, first select the cell you want to stop watching. Then, click 'Delete Watch' in the Watch Window.
choices: select the cell you want to stop watching, then click "Delete Watch" in Watch Window
